item.title: Shannon add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Shannon add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Shannon add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Iâ€™d said it before and meant it: Alive or undead, the love of my life was a badass." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Live to the point of tears." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Shannon add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Remember, we're madly in love, so it's all right to kiss me anytime you feel like it." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Shannon add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Saying 'I notice you're a nerd' is like saying, 'Hey, I notice that you'd rather be intelligent than be stupid, that you'd rather be thoughtful than be vapid, that you believe that there are things that matter more than the arrest record of Lindsay Lohan. Why is that?' In fact, it seems to me that most contemporary insults are pretty lame. Even 'lame' is kind of lame. Saying 'You're lame' is like saying 'You walk with a limp.' Yeah, whatever, so does 50 Cent, and he's done all right for himself." -- John Green

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Shannon add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and theyâ€™ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Shannon add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Thomas Edison's last words were 'It's very beautiful over there'. I don't know where there is, but I believe it's somewhere, and I hope it's beautiful." -- John Green

item.title: Shannon add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I may die young, but at least I'll die smart." -- John Green

item.title: Shannon add a quote by John Green
item.description: "My thoughts are stars I cannot fathom into constellations." -- John Green

item.title: Shannon add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book." -- John Green

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "We believe in ordinary acts of bravery, in the courage that drives one person to stand up for another." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I might be in love with you." He smiles a little. "I'm waiting until I'm sure to tell you, though." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Sometimes crying or laughing are the only options left, and laughing feels better right now." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Conan O'Brien
item.description: "All I ask is one thing, and Iâ€™m asking this particularly of young people: please donâ€™t be cynical. I hate cynicism, for the record, itâ€™s my least favorite quality and it doesnâ€™t lead anywhere. Nobody in life gets exactly what they thought they were going to get. But if you work really hard and youâ€™re kind, amazing things will happen." -- Conan O'Brien
